contents.text: Welcome to Automattic in San Francisco, where we're passionate about making the web a better place with WordPress.
For Sales and Partnership inquiries, press 1.
Press 1 to speak with our Enterprise Sales team.
Please hold while we connect you to our Enterprise Sales team; your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss customizing an enterprise WordPress solution for my company’s high-traffic site.
Discuss enterprise-grade WordPress hosting options for my veteran support organization
Discuss enterprise subscription tiers and SLA details for high-traffic WordPress deployments
I’d like to speak with someone about pricing and setup for an enterprise WordPress solution for my organization.
Inquire about enterprise hosting plans and pricing for my university physics lab’s website

contents.text: Press 2 to learn about our Integration and Partnership programs.
One moment please, connecting you to our Partnership and Integration specialists.

navigationGoals: I’m looking to explore integrating my SaaS platform with WordPress’s partnership program.
Explore partnership and integration programs to connect my veteran services platform with WordPress
Explore integration APIs and co-marketing partnership frameworks with Automattic
I’m interested in information on partnering with WordPress and integrating its features into my company’s systems.
Learn about Automattic’s integration program to embed custom physics simulation tools into WordPress

contents.text: For Technical Support and Developer Tools assistance, press 2.
Please hold for our WordPress.com Hosting support team; we’ll be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need immediate support to troubleshoot slow loading on my WordPress.com hosting.
Get troubleshooting help for my veteran-focused blog hosted on WordPress.com
Troubleshoot SSL renewal errors and CDN caching issues on my WordPress.com hosting
I need assistance restoring access and fixing my WordPress.com hosted site.
Get support configuring WordPress.com hosting for my student research blog, including domain setup and file upload limits

contents.text: Press 2 for Developer Tools and API support.
Thank you for your patience; connecting you to our Developer Tools support now.

navigationGoals: I need help using the WordPress Developer API to automate our content publishing.
Request API and developer tools support to integrate my veteran outreach app with WordPress
Resolve OAuth authentication and rate-limit problems with the WordPress.com REST API
I’d like help understanding and using the WordPress developer API for a custom feature.
Ask for help using WordPress’s Developer API to automate publishing data from my physics experiments
